scripts.build:tailwind: yarn build:less && tailwindcss build src/style/style.css -c ./tailwind.config.js -o src/style/style.css
scripts.watch: yarn clean && mkdir dist && yarn build:tailwind && cp -R static dist/static && cp manifest.json dist/ && parcel watch src/{records.html,options.html,background.js} -t node --bundle-node-modules -d dist/src/ --public-url ./
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:tailwind && parcel build src/{records.html,options.html,background.js} -d dist/src/ --public-url ./ && cp -R static dist/static && cp manifest.json dist/
